title: PS Plus deals: grab a 12 month membership for under $30 this weekend
author: tabitha-baker
summary: Just in time for an excellent month of free games
article: PS Plus deals are offering 12 month memberships for under $30 this weekend - that's excellent news if you're looking to renew your subscription or get started with Sony's service. This month's free games also offer two even more compelling reasons to check out PS Plus deals this weekend. With Destruction: AllStars and the next-gen release of Control joining the roster, there's plenty of content to keep you playing.

A 12 month PS Plus membership will usually set you back $69.99, but you can grab it for just $29.89 right now. We usually see PS Plus deals scraping 30% off on a day to day basis, with the odd sale reaching half price.

However, that 54% discount is the largest we've seen in a long time, but CDKeys' prices do change fairly regularly, so we wouldn't wait too long to take advantage. There's also a 3 month membership on sale for $15.19 (was $27.59), but you're not getting nearly as much value here.
Not in the US? Scroll down for more PS Plus deals in your region.

We're tracking all the latest PS5 restocks if you're still trying to get your hands on a console. However, if you're one of the lucky ones to have already snagged a PS5 deal, you'll find plenty of cheap PS5 games currently on sale as well. We're rounding up all the best DualSense controller prices from around the web for even more discounts too.
